backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing quiz, student, teacher, and password‑based admin functionality with persistent maps and authorization mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module upgrading stored actor state by adding the adminPassword field with a default value.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file involved in the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining color variables and dark mode theming for the frontend.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing student/teacher navigation, view state, and routing between quiz and admin screens.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Shared layout component providing header, footer, and styled page wrapper.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing attribution and styling.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with DEV Classes branding and teacher password‑auth controls for switching modes and signing out.
frontend/src/components/TeacherGate.tsx: Protects teacher-only content by verifying a stored password via backend and showing a login form when not authenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, loading stored identities, handling login flow, and exposing identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for teacher quiz CRUD operations and student quiz access using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTeacherAuth.ts: Deprecated placeholder returning static unauthenticated teacher state.
frontend/src/hooks/useTeacherPasswordAut: Manages teacher password auth via sessionStorage with login, logout, and update helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a warm color theme with light and dark mode variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/student/ActiveQuizPic: Displays available published quizzes to students with loading and error states and allows selecting a quiz to start.
frontend/src/pages/student/QuizTake.tsx: Displays quiz questions, tracks answers and navigation, and submits student responses if not previously attempted.
frontend/src/pages/student/StudentResult: Shows a simplified result page for students who have already completed a quiz, with basic quiz info and a back option.
Provides a login form for students to enter their name and course before accessing quizzes.
frontend/src/pages/teacher/ChangePasswor: Allows teachers to update their account password with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/pages/teacher/QuizEditor.ts: Enables creating or editing quizzes, including managing questions, options, and saving changes via mutations.
frontend/src/pages/teacher/TeacherDashbo: Lists a teacher's quizzes with options to create, edit, publish, view results, and change password.
frontend/src/pages/teacher/TeacherResult: Teacher results page that loads quizzes, shows attempts for a selected quiz, and allows viewing detailed student attempt data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage fallback and hash-routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing quiz app state, features, requirements, and architectural notes.
